[[Image:American Tolkien Society Calendar 1988.jpg|thumb]]

'''American Tolkien Society Calendar 1988''' contains black and white illustrations by fourteen different artists. It is printed on tan paper and is:
:A dual calendar 1988: featuring the everyday calendar most of us use, and the Shire Reckoning calendar set forth by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] in Appendix D of [[The Lord of the Rings]].

* Dimensions: 11 x 8.5 inches
* Stapled on the fold
* Punched hanging hole
